Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary

Class TileSet

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual.Sprite
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary.TileSet
public class TileSet extends Sprite
A class that represents a tile set.
Author:
Aryan Rai

  • Method Details

    • getTile

      public Sprite getTile(int index, boolean verticalScan)
      This method returns a tile from the tile set.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the tile.
      verticalScan - If true, the tile will be returned by scanning vertically.
      Returns:
      The tile at the specified index in the tile set.

    • getTile

      public Sprite getTile(int x, int y)
      This method returns a tile from the tile set.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the tile.
      y - The y coordinate of the tile.
      Returns:
      The tile at the specified coordinates in the tile set.
